member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.AnalyzeSentimentResult
member.summary: The result of the analyze sentiment operation on a single document, containing the predicted sentiment for each sentence as well as for the full document.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.AnalyzeSentimentResult.DocumentSentiment
member.summary: Gets the predicted sentiment for the full document.

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.AnalyzeSentimentResultCollection
member.summary: Collection of objects corresponding to a batch of documents, and information about the batch operation.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.AnalyzeSentimentResultCollection.Statistics
member.summary: Gets statistics about the documents and how it was processed by the service. This property will have a value when IncludeStatistics is set to true in the client call.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.AnalyzeSentimentResultCollection.ModelVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of the text analytics model used by this operation on this batch of documents.

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.CategorizedEntity
member.summary: A word or phrase identified as an entity that can be categorized as known type in a given taxonomy. The set of categories recognized by the text analytics service is described at .

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.CategorizedEntity.Text
member.summary: Gets the entity text as it appears in the input document.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.CategorizedEntity.Category
member.summary: Gets the entity category inferred by the text analytics service's named entity recognition model. The list of available categories is described at .

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.CategorizedEntity.SubCategory
member.summary: Gets the sub category of the entity inferred by the text analytics service's named entity recognition model. This property may not have a value if a sub category doesn't exist for this entity. The list of available categories and subcategories is described at .

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.CategorizedEntity.GraphemeOffset
member.summary: Gets the starting position (in Unicode graphemes) for the matching text in the input document.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.CategorizedEntity.GraphemeLength
member.summary: Gets the length (in Unicode graphemes) of the matching text in the input document.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.CategorizedEntity.ConfidenceScore
member.summary: Gets a score between 0 and 1, indicating the confidence that the text substring matches this inferred entity.

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.DetectedLanguage
member.summary: A prediction of the language in which a document is written in.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.DetectedLanguage.Name
member.summary: Gets the spelled-out name of the detected language (for example, "English" or "French").

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.DetectedLanguage.Iso6391Name
member.summary: Gets a two letter representation of the detected language according to the ISO 639-1 standard (for example, "en" or "fr").

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.DetectedLanguage.Score
member.summary: Gets a confidence score between 0 and 1. Scores close to 1 indicate high certainty that the identified language is correct.

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.DetectLanguageInput
member.summary: An input to the detect language operation. This object allows the caller to specify a unique document id, as well as the full text of a document and a hint indicating the document's country of origin to assist the text analytics predictive model in detecting the document's language.

member.name: F:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.DetectLanguageInput.None
member.summary: A wildcard that allows to set CountryHint to None so the servide model doesn't use any default CountryHint.

member.name: M:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.DetectLanguageInput.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The id of the document represented by this instance. The id must be unique within the batch of documents analyzed in a given detect language operation.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.DetectLanguageInput.Id
member.summary: Gets the unique, non-empty identifier for this document.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.DetectLanguageInput.CountryHint
member.summary: Gets or sets a hint to assist the text analytics model in predicting the language the document is written in. If unspecified, this value will be set to the default country hint in in the request sent to the service. To remove this behavior, set to .

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.DetectLanguageInput.Text
member.summary: Gets the text of the document.

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.DetectLanguageResult
member.summary: The result of the detect language operation on a single document, containing a prediction of what language the document is written in.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.DetectLanguageResult.PrimaryLanguage
member.summary: The primary language detected in the document.

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.DetectLanguageResultCollection
member.summary: Collection of objects corresponding to a batch of documents, and information about the batch operation.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.DetectLanguageResultCollection.Statistics
member.summary: Gets statistics about the documents batch and how it was processed by the service. This property will have a value when IncludeStatistics is set to true in the client call.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.DetectLanguageResultCollection.ModelVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of the text analytics model used by this operation on this batch of documents.

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.DocumentSentiment
member.summary: Overall predicted sentiment and confidence scores for the document. It also includes per-sentence sentiment prediction. For more information regarding text sentiment, see .

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.DocumentSentiment.Sentiment
member.summary: Gets the predicted sentiment for the analyzed document.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.DocumentSentiment.ConfidenceScores
member.summary: Gets the sentiment confidence score (Softmax score) between 0 and 1, for each sentiment. Higher values signify higher confidence.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.DocumentSentiment.Sentences
member.summary: Gets the predicted sentiment for each sentence in the corresponding document.

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory
member.summary: Gets the entity category inferred by the Text Analytics service's named entity recognition model. The list of available categories is described at .

member.name: F:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.Person
member.summary: Specifies that the entity corresponds to a Person.

member.name: F:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.PersonType
member.summary: Specifies that the entity corresponds to a job type or role held by a person.

member.name: F:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.Location
member.summary: Specifies that the entity contains natural or human-made landmarks, structures, or geographical features.

member.name: F:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.Organization
member.summary: Specifies that the entity contains the name of an organization, corporation, agency, or other group of people.

member.name: F:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.Event
member.summary: Specifies that the entity contains historical, social and natural-occuring events.

member.name: F:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.Product
member.summary: Specifies that the entity contains physical objects of various categories.

member.name: F:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.Skill
member.summary: Specifies an entity describing a capability or expertise.

member.name: F:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.DateTime
member.summary: Specifies that the entity contains a date, time or duration.

member.name: F:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.PhoneNumber
member.summary: Specifies that the entity contains a phone number (US phone numbers only).

member.name: F:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.Email
member.summary: Specifies that the entity contains an email address.

member.name: F:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.Url
member.summary: Specifies that the entity contains an Internet URL.

member.name: F:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.IPAddress
member.summary: Specifies that the entity contains an Internet Protocol Address.

member.name: F:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.Quantity
member.summary: Specifies that the entity contains a number or numeric quantity.

member.name: M:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.op_Implicit(System.String)~Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory
member.summary: Defines implicit conversion from string to EntityCategory.
member.returns: The string as an EntityCategory.

member.name: M:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.op_Explicit(Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory)~System.String
member.summary: Defines explicit conversion from EntityCategory to string.
member.returns: The EntityCategory as a string.

member.name: M:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.op_Equality(Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory,Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory)
member.summary: Compares two EntityCategory values for equality.
member.returns: true if the EntityCategory objects are equal or are both null; false otherwise.

member.name: M:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.op_Inequality(Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory,Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory)
member.summary: Compares two EntityCategory values for inequality.
member.returns: true if the EntityCategory objects are not equal; false otherwise.

member.name: M:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.Equals(Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory)
member.summary: Compares the EntityCategory for equality with another EntityCategory.
member.param: The EntityCategory with which to compare.
member.returns: true if the EntityCategory objects are equal; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current object.
member.param: The object to compare with the current object.
member.returns: true if the specified object is equal to the current object; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.GetHashCode
member.summary: Serves as the default hash function.
member.returns: A hash code for the current object.

member.name: M:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.EntityCategory.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the EntityCategory.
member.returns: The EntityCategory as a string.

member.summary: Collection of objects corresponding to a batch of documents, and information about the batch operation.

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.LinkedEntity
member.summary: A word or phrase identified as a known entity in a data source. A link to the entry in the data source is provided as well as the formal name of the entity used in the data source. Note that the formal name may be different from the exact text match in the input document.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.LinkedEntity.Name
member.summary: Gets the formal name of the entity.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.LinkedEntity.DataSourceEntityId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier of the entity in the data source.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.LinkedEntity.Language
member.summary: Gets the language used in the data source.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.LinkedEntity.DataSource
member.summary: Gets the name of the data source used to extract the entity linking.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.LinkedEntity.Url
member.summary: Gets the URL that identifies the linked entity's entry in the data source.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.LinkedEntity.Matches
member.summary: Collection identifying the substrings of the document that correspond to this linked entity.

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.LinkedEntityMatch
member.summary: Details regarding the specific substring in the document matching the linked entity, or well-known item, that the text analytics model identified.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.LinkedEntityMatch.Text
member.summary: Gets the entity text as it appears in the document.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.LinkedEntityMatch.ConfidenceScore
member.summary: Gets a score between 0 and 1, indicating the confidence that this substring matches the corresponding linked entity.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.LinkedEntityMatch.GraphemeOffset
member.summary: Gets the starting position (in Unicode graphemes) for the matching text in the document.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.LinkedEntityMatch.GraphemeLength
member.summary: Gets the length (in Unicode graphemes) of the matching text in the document.

member.summary: A word or phrase identified as a Personally Identifiable Information that can be categorized as known type in a given taxonomy. The set of categories recognized by the text analytics service is described at .

member.summary: Gets the entity text as it appears in the input document.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.PiiEntity.Category
member.summary: Gets the entity category inferred by the text analytics service's named entity recognition model. The list of available categories is described at .

member.summary: Gets the sub category of the entity inferred by the text analytics service's named entity recognition model. This property may not have a value if a sub category doesn't exist for this entity. The list of available categories and subcategories is described at .

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.PiiEntity.ConfidenceScore
member.summary: Gets a score between 0 and 1, indicating the confidence that the text substring matches this inferred entity.

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.SentenceSentiment
member.summary: The predicted sentiment for a given span of text. For more information regarding text sentiment, see .

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.SentenceSentiment.Sentiment
member.summary: Gets the predicted sentiment for the analyzed input.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.SentenceSentiment.ConfidenceScores
member.summary: Gets the sentiment confidence score (Softmax score) between 0 and 1, for each sentiment. Higher values signify higher confidence.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.SentenceSentiment.GraphemeOffset
member.summary: Gets the starting position (in Unicode graphemes) for the matching text in the input.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.SentenceSentiment.GraphemeLength
member.summary: Gets the length (in Unicode graphemes) of the matching text in the input.

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.SentimentConfidenceScores
member.summary: The sentiment confidence scores, by sentiment.

member.summary: Gets a score between 0 and 1, indicating the confidence that the sentiment of the analyzed text is positive.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.SentimentConfidenceScores.Neutral
member.summary: Gets a score between 0 and 1, indicating the confidence that the sentiment of the analyzed text is neutral.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.SentimentConfidenceScores.Negative
member.summary: Gets a score between 0 and 1, indicating the confidence that the sentiment of the analyzed text is negative.

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsApiKeyCredential

member.param: API key to authenticate the service against.

member.name: M:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsClient.DetectLanguageAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Runs a predictive model to determine the language the passed-in document is written in, and returns the detected language as well as a score indicating the model's confidence that the inferred language is correct. Scores close to 1 indicate high certainty in the result. 120 languages are supported. For document length limits, maximum batch size, and supported text encoding, see .
member.param: Indicates the country of origin of the document to assist the text analytics model in predicting the language it is written in. If unspecified, this value will be set to the default country hint in in the request sent to the service. To remove this behavior, set to .
member.returns: A result containing the detected language or an error if the model could not analyze the document.
member.exception: Service returned a non-success status code.

member.name: M:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsClient.DetectLanguage(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Runs a predictive model to determine the language the passed-in document is written in, and returns the detected language as well as a score indicating the model's confidence that the inferred language is correct. Scores close to 1 indicate high certainty in the result. 120 languages are supported. For document length limits, maximum batch size, and supported text encoding, see .
member.param: Indicates the country of origin of the document to assist the text analytics model in predicting the language it is written in. If unspecified, this value will be set to the default country hint in in the request sent to the service. To remove this behavior, set to .
member.returns: A result containing the detected language or an error if the model could not analyze the document.
member.exception: Service returned a non-success status code.

member.name: M:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsClient.DetectLanguageBatchAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String,Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsRequestOptions,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Runs a predictive model to determine the language the passed-in documents are written in, and returns, for each one, the detected language as well as a score indicating the model's confidence that the inferred language is correct. Scores close to 1 indicate high certainty in the result. 120 languages are supported. For document length limits, maximum batch size, and supported text encoding, see .
member.param: A collection of documents to analyze.

Indicates the country of origin of all of the documents to assist the text analytics model in predicting the language they are written in. If unspecified, this value will be set to the default country hint in in the request sent to the service. To remove this behavior, set to .
used to select the version of the predictive model to run, and whether statistics are returned in the response.
member.returns: A result containing the detected language or an error if the model could not analyze the documents.
member.exception: Service returned a non-success status code.

member.name: M:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsClient.DetectLanguageBatch(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String,Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsRequestOptions,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Runs a predictive model to determine the language the passed-in documents are written in, and returns, for each one, the detected language as well as a score indicating the model's confidence that the inferred language is correct. Scores close to 1 indicate high certainty in the result. 120 languages are supported. For document length limits, maximum batch size, and supported text encoding, see .
member.param: A collection of documents to analyze.

Indicates the country of origin of all of the documents to assist the text analytics model in predicting the language they are written in. If unspecified, this value will be set to the default country hint in in the request sent to the service. To remove this behavior, set to .
used to select the version of the predictive model to run, and whether statistics are returned in the response.
member.returns: A result containing the detected language or an error if the model could not analyze the documents.
member.exception: Service returned a non-success status code.

member.summary: Runs a predictive model to determine the language the passed-in documents are written in, and returns, for each one, the detected language as well as a score indicating the model's confidence that the inferred language is correct. Scores close to 1 indicate high certainty in the result. 120 languages are supported. For document length limits, maximum batch size, and supported text encoding, see .

used to select the version of the predictive model to run, and whether statistics are returned in the response.
member.returns: A result containing the detected language or an error if the model could not analyze the documents.
member.exception: Service returned a non-success status code.

Scores close to 1 indicate high certainty in the result. 120 languages are supported. For document length limits, maximum batch size, and supported text encoding, see .

used to select the version of the predictive model to run, and whether statistics are returned in the response.

member.name: M:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsClient.RecognizeEntitiesAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Runs a predictive model to identify a collection of named entities in the passed-in document, and categorize those entities into types such as person, location, or organization. For more information on available categories, see . For a list of languages supported by this operation, see . For document length limits, maximum batch size, and supported text encoding, see .
member.param: The language that the document is written in. If unspecified, this value will be set to the default language in in the request sent to the service. If set to an empty string, the service will apply a model where the language is explicitly set to "None".
member.returns: A result containing the collection of entities identified in the document, as well as a score indicating the confidence that the entity correctly matches the identified substring.
member.exception: Service returned a non-success status code.

member.name: M:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsClient.RecognizeEntities(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Runs a predictive model to identify a collection of named entities in the passed-in document, and categorize those entities into types such as person, location, or organization. For more information on available categories, see . For a list of languages supported by this operation, see . For document length limits, maximum batch size, and supported text encoding, see .
member.param: The language that the document is written in. If unspecified, this value will be set to the default language in in the request sent to the service. If set to an empty string, the service will apply a model where the language is explicitly set to "None".
member.returns: A result containing the collection of entities identified in the document, as well as a score indicating the confidence that the entity correctly matches the identified substring.
member.exception: Service returned a non-success status code.

member.name: M:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsClient.RecognizeEntitiesBatchAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String,Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsRequestOptions,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Runs a predictive model to identify a collection of named entities in the passed-in documents, and categorize those entities into types such as person, location, or organization. For more information on available categories, see . For a list of languages supported by this operation, see . For document length limits, maximum batch size, and supported text encoding, see .
member.param: The language that all the documents are written in. If unspecified, this value will be set to the default language in in the request sent to the service. If set to an empty string, the service will apply a model where the language is explicitly set to "None".
used to select the version of the predictive model to run, and whether statistics are returned in the response.
member.returns: A result containing the collection of entities identified for each of the documents, as well as scores indicating the confidence that a given entity correctly matches the identified substring.
member.exception: Service returned a non-success status code.

member.name: M:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsClient.AnalyzeSentimentAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Runs a predictive model to identify the positive, negative, neutral or mixed sentiment contained in the document, as well as a score indicating the model's confidence in the predicted sentiment. For a list of languages supported by this operation, see . For document length limits, maximum batch size, and supported text encoding, see .
member.param: The language that the document is written in. If unspecified, this value will be set to the default language in in the request sent to the service. If set to an empty string, the service will apply a model where the language is explicitly set to "None".
member.returns: A result containing sentiment predictions for the document and each of the sentences it contains.
member.exception: Service returned a non-success status code.

member.summary: Runs a model to identify a collection of significant phrases found in the passed-in document. For example, for the document "The food was delicious and there were wonderful staff", the API returns the main talking points: "food" and "wonderful staff". For a list of languages supported by this operation, see . For document length limits, maximum batch size, and supported text encoding, see .
member.param: The language that the document is written in. If unspecified, this value will be set to the default language in in the request sent to the service. If set to an empty string, the service will apply a model where the language is explicitly set to "None".
member.returns: A result containing the collection of key phrases identified in the document.
member.exception: Service returned a non-success status code.

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsClientOptions
member.summary: Options that allow to configure the management of the request sent to the service.

member.name: F:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsClientOptions.LatestVersion
member.summary: The latest service version supported by this client library.

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsClientOptions.ServiceVersion
member.summary: The versions of the Text Analytics service supported by this client library.

member.name: F:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsClientOptions.ServiceVersion.V3_0_preview_1
member.summary: Version 3.0-preview.1

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsClientOptions.Version
member.summary: Gets the of the service API used when making requests.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsClientOptions.DefaultCountryHint
member.summary: Default country hint value to use in all client calls. If no value is specified, "us" is set as default. To remove this behavior, set to .

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsClientOptions.DefaultLanguage
member.summary: Default language value to use in all client calls. If no value is specified, "en" is set as default.

member.name: M:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsClientOptions.#ctor(Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsClientOptions.ServiceVersion)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The of the service API used when making requests.

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsError
member.summary: Text Analitics Error.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsError.Code
member.summary: Error code that serves as an indicator of the HTTP error code.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsError.Message
member.summary: Message that contains more information about the reason of the error.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsError.Target
member.summary: Target of the particular error (e.g. the name of the property in error).

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsRequestOptions
member.summary: Options that allow callers to specify details about how the operation is run and what information is returned from it by the service.

member.name: M:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsRequestOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsRequestOptions.IncludeStatistics
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that, if set to true, indicates that the service should return document and document batch statistics with the results of the operation.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsRequestOptions.ModelVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that, if set, indicates the version of the text analytics model that will be used to generate the result. For supported model versions, see operation-specific documentation, for example: .

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsResult
member.summary: Base type for results of text analytics operations corresponding to a document. If the operation is unsuccessful, the Id and Error properties will be populated, but not others.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsResult.Id
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier for the document that generated the result.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsResult.Statistics
member.summary: Gets statistics about the document and how it was processed by the service. This property will have a value when IncludeStatistics is set to true in the client call.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsResult.Error
member.summary: Gets the error explaining why the operation failed on this document. This property will have a value only when the document cannot be processed.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextAnalyticsResult.HasError
member.summary: Indicates that the document was not successfully processed and an error was returned for this document.

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextDocumentBatchStatistics
member.summary: A collection of statistics describing the batch of documents submitted to the service for analysis in a given request. This information is provided on the result collection returned by an operation when the caller passes in a with IncludeStatistics set to true.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextDocumentBatchStatistics.DocumentCount
member.summary: Gets the number of documents submitted in the request batch.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextDocumentBatchStatistics.ValidDocumentCount
member.summary: Gets the number of valid documents submitted in the request batch. This number excludes empty documents, documents whose size exceeds the service's size limit, and documents in unsupported languages.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextDocumentBatchStatistics.InvalidDocumentCount
member.summary: Gets the number of invalid documents submitted in the request batch. This number includes empty documents, documents whose size exceeds the service's size limit, and documents in unsupported languages.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextDocumentBatchStatistics.TransactionCount
member.summary: Gets the number of transactions required to complete the operation on all documents submitted in the request batch.

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextDocumentInput
member.summary: An input representing an individual text document to be analyzed by the text analytics predictive model for a given operation. The document contains the document's id, the full text of the document, and the language that the document is written in.

member.name: M:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextDocumentInput.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.param: The id of the document represented by this instance. The id must be unique within the batch of documents analyzed in a given operation.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextDocumentInput.Id
member.summary: Gets the unique, non-empty identifier for this input document.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextDocumentInput.Language
member.summary: Gets or sets the language the input document is written in. This value is the two letter ISO 639-1 representation of the language (for example, "en" for English or "es" for Spanish).

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextDocumentInput.Text
member.summary: Gets the text of the document.

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextDocumentStatistics
member.summary: A collection of statistics describing an individual input document. This information is provided on the result collection returned by an operation when the caller passes in a with IncludeStatistics set to true.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextDocumentStatistics.GraphemeCount
member.summary: Gets the number of characters (in Unicode graphemes) the corresponding document contains.

member.name: P:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextDocumentStatistics.TransactionCount
member.summary: Gets the number of transactions used by the service to analyze the input document.

member.name: T:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextSentiment
member.summary: The predicted sentiment for a given document.

member.name: F:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextSentiment.Positive
member.summary: Indicates that the sentiment is positive.

member.name: F:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextSentiment.Neutral
member.summary: Indicates that the sentiment is neutral.

member.name: F:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextSentiment.Negative
member.summary: Indicates that the sentiment is negative.

member.name: F:Azure.AI.TextAnalytics.TextSentiment.Mixed
member.summary: Indicates that the document contains mixed sentiments.

member.name: T:Azure.Core.Argument
member.summary: Argument validation.

remarks.para: This class should be shared via source using Azure.Core.props and contain only common argument validation. It is declared partial so that you can use the same familiar class name but extend it with project-specific validation. To extend the functionality of this class, just declare your own partial class with project-specific methods.
Be sure to document exceptions thrown by these methods on your public methods.

member.name: T:Azure.Core.ArrayBufferWriter`1
member.summary: Represents a heap-based, array-backed output sink into which data can be written.

member.name: M:Azure.Core.ArrayBufferWriter`1.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of an , in which data can be written to, with the default initial capacity.

member.name: M:Azure.Core.ArrayBufferWriter`1.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an instance of an , in which data can be written to, with an initial capacity specified.
member.param: The minimum capacity with which to initialize the underlying buffer.
member.exception: Thrown when is not positive (i.e. less than or equal to 0).

member.name: P:Azure.Core.ArrayBufferWriter`1.WrittenMemory
member.summary: Returns the data written to the underlying buffer so far, as a .

member.name: P:Azure.Core.ArrayBufferWriter`1.WrittenSpan
member.summary: Returns the data written to the underlying buffer so far, as a .

member.name: P:Azure.Core.ArrayBufferWriter`1.WrittenCount
member.summary: Returns the amount of data written to the underlying buffer so far.

member.name: P:Azure.Core.ArrayBufferWriter`1.Capacity
member.summary: Returns the total amount of space within the underlying buffer.

member.name: P:Azure.Core.ArrayBufferWriter`1.FreeCapacity
member.summary: Returns the amount of space available that can still be written into without forcing the underlying buffer to grow.

member.name: M:Azure.Core.ArrayBufferWriter`1.Clear
member.summary: Clears the data written to the underlying buffer.
member.remarks: You must clear the before trying to re-use it.

member.name: M:Azure.Core.ArrayBufferWriter`1.Advance(System.Int32)
member.summary: Notifies that amount of data was written to the output /.
member.exception: Thrown when is negative.
Thrown when attempting to advance past the end of the underlying buffer.
member.remarks: You must request a new buffer after calling Advance to continue writing more data and cannot write to a previously acquired buffer.

member.name: M:Azure.Core.ArrayBufferWriter`1.GetMemory(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a to write to that is at least the requested length (specified by ). If no is provided (or it's equal to 0), some non-empty buffer is returned.
member.exception: Thrown when is negative.
member.remarks: This will never return an empty .
There is no guarantee that successive calls will return the same buffer or the same-sized buffer.
You must request a new buffer after calling Advance to continue writing more data and cannot write to a previously acquired buffer.

member.name: M:Azure.Core.ArrayBufferWriter`1.GetSpan(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a to write to that is at least the requested length (specified by ). If no is provided (or it's equal to 0), some non-empty buffer is returned.
member.exception: Thrown when is negative.
member.remarks: This will never return an empty .
There is no guarantee that successive calls will return the same buffer or the same-sized buffer.
You must request a new buffer after calling Advance to continue writing more data and cannot write to a previously acquired buffer.

member.name: T:Azure.Core.Pipeline.ActivityExtensions
member.summary: HACK HACK HACK. Some runtime environments like Azure.Functions downgrade System.Diagnostic.DiagnosticSource package version causing method not found exceptions in customer apps This type is a temporary workaround to avoid the issue.

member.name: T:Azure.Core.Pipeline.TaskExtensions.Enumerable`1
member.summary: Both and are defined as public structs so that foreach can use duck typing to call and avoid heap memory allocation. Please don't delete this method and don't make these types private.
